name: GVNR
description: GVNR will unlock $3 Trillion in liquidity, mobilise Bitcoin into DeFi, and enables direct, trustless asset control across all networked chains. GVNR is a foundational General Message Passing layer for Web3 - unifying all blockchains to unlock liquidity and create a truly interoperable, decentralised future. The GVNR Protocol enables universal permissionless control of all chains, assets and DApps - designed for users, firms, and AI agents alike. This decentralised network will enable smart contracts and developers to operate seamlessly across the entire crypto ecosystem. GVNR will reshape DeFi into a sovereign, frictionless landscape where liquidity flows freely, risk is minimised, and capital efficiency reigns supreme. No bridging. No wrapping. Just governance.
